name: Quilladin

evolution.description: Quilladin can evolve into Chesnaught at level 14 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 10 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Spiny Armor Pokémon. It relies on its sturdy shell to deflect predators' attacks. It counterattacks with its sharp quills.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Bulletproof
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to damage from moves with Bullet, Ball, or Bomb in their name.
